p: The use of technology has the potential to screen travelers based on symptoms and travel history. For example, Taiwan integrated its national health insurance database with its immigration and customs database to create a “big data” resource for analytics [ 16]. The database was used to classify travelers’ infectious risks and it generated real-time alerts during clinical visits to aid in case identification [ 16]. It can also be utilized to test patients for COVID-19 who had previously tested negative for influenza; one COVID-19 case was confirmed from 113 patients who had already undergone influenza screening [ 16].
